purpose: The email announces an international call for applications for an Assistant Professor position at the University of Coimbra.
evidence_sentences: The Department of Informatics Engineering at the University of Coimbra (Portugal) is pleased to announce an international call for applications for one tenure-track position at the level of Assistant Professor in the field of Informatics Engineering.
More details and the official application portal can be found here: https://apply.uc.pt/IT136-25-15300.
